system_description: ContosoShop – React SPA front-end with REST API in Azure App Service + SQL back-end + Service Bus for transaction decoupling.
issue_summary: Customers are unable to complete checkout due to persistent 500 errors from the API.

conversation_history.message: Checkout is failing for all users with a generic error. We are seeing a spike in 500 errors on the /api/orders endpoint since 04:25 UTC. Can you investigate urgently?
Thank you for reporting this, Jordan. We are currently investigating the API errors and will update you with our findings as soon as possible.
Initial logs indicate repeated SQL timeouts during order creation. We are reviewing the database performance metrics and will escalate to the infrastructure team if necessary.
